>So said jxingtang on 2003-07-22 --------------------
>I do not know whethe=
r this is a duplicated question. I have a program 
>with large number of co=
nsole output from different source. Basically, 
>I am using System.out.prin=
tln(...). How could I verify those outputs 
>are correct? Thanks!

1. Don't=
 use System.out in your application directly. Your application components s=
hould accept a PrintWriter as a parameter somewhere.
2. In your tests, subs=
titute a PrintWriter wrapping a StringWriter in place of System.out. This i=
s easy to verify.
